about_the_game:
Comic action and platform game, set in northeastern Brazil, with the presence of myths and legends from folklore and a visual style based on cordel literature.

  • Set in the northeast of Brazil with the myths and legends of folklore
  • Levels with challenging enemies and obstacles
  • Monochromatic visual style inspired by cordel literature
  • Explore: acquire items with unique mechanics and discover previously inaccessible locations
  • World divided into typical biomes in northeastern Brazil

name: Xilosaga Demo
short_description: Xilosaga is an action and platform game where you play as Tatuapu, an Indian from a local tribe, who ventures out with the aim of purging a plague within the carrancas, which began to attract evil spirits and dominated the inhabitants of northeastern Brazil.
